author: Reboot's Ramblings

changelog.release_notes:
v2.1:
-Fixed the display name for it to be shorter on the watch.

v2.0:
-Now includes Heart Rate display in the Sports View for watches with a Heart Rate Monitor.
-Heart Rate display is updated every 5 seconds (with plans to improve this in future releases).
-Compiled with Pebble SDK 4.0.1.

v1.6:
Fixed an issue where double pressing the back button on the Sport view would lock up the app.

v1.5:
-Fixed issues with the action bar not appearing.

description:
README: This app requires Music Boss for Pebble (Companion App) and the purchase of the Optional Addon. This app does not come as part of the Music Boss for Pebble base companion app.

Music Boss Sport is the perfect companion to your running/cycling sessions. It offers the music controls you are used to with a simplified user interface and feature set that lets you focus on your activity.

Music Boss Sport displays sport information from Pebble Sports API compatible apps such as RunKeeper. This allows you to see the information you’re used to seeing in the Pebble Sport app in Music Boss Sport, but maintain music controls at the same time!

Simplified Controls:
Back Button:
2x Press takes you to the Running view
1x Press from the Running view takes you back to the Music View

Select Button:
1x Press is Play/Pause
2x Press takes you to the Pebble Sports app to Pause and Resume your Activity.
Long press shows you your app list or offers thumbs up/down rating for compatible music apps

Up/Down Buttons:
Single pressing adjusts volume
Long pressing skips songs

v2.0:

title: Music Boss Sport
